meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dave Gramling Margie Melby Pat O'Connor Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #830.

td.p: Dave Gramling, a teacher and department chairman from Chelmsford, Massachusetts
Margie Melby, an acccounting manager from Grenada Hills, California
Pat O'Connor, an executive assistant from Levittown, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,800)

tr.td: REPTILES
SAINTS
EASY SONGS
FORECASTERS
LANDMARKS
A.K.A.
